requirements.name: II. Major Requirements: 36 upper-division semester credit hours

options.name: Guided Electives; 3 semester credit hours of one of the following:

options.description: Plus any 9 semester credit hours of courses with PSY or CGS or CLDP or NSC prefixes or the following courses: SPAU 3301, SPAU 3303, SPAU 3304, SPAU 3340, SPAU 3343, SPAU 3344, SPAU 3345 or SPAU 4308.

requirements.name: III. Elective Requirements: 42 semester credit hours

options.description: Electives are selected by students to explore areas of concentration in Psychology as well as explore interests outside the field. Both lower- and upper-division courses may count as electives but students must be sure to complete at least 51 semester credit hours of upper-division courses to qualify for graduation.
